translation.en: True!
♪ She's True ♪ ♪ True! ♪
♪ True ♪ ♪ True! ♪
♪ She'll wish for me and you ♪
♪ Hero, hero! ♪
♪ She's True! ♪
♪ True and the Rainbow Kingdom! ♪
-[laughing] -Hi, Mom.
Neverending Rainbow Day has started!
translation.it: Il Giorno dell'Arcobaleno Infinito è iniziato.

translation.en: I wish it really was neverending!
Could you imagine a full-time rainbow carnival?
I think it means the rainbow is neverending, Bartleby, not the day.
translation.it: È l'arcobaleno a essere infinito, Bartleby, non il giorno.

translation.en: Hmm... where do we start, B?
Easy. Breakfast!
[mumbling] Pancakes. Yummy-yummy.
Mmm! Blue, green, yellow, red... Yup, they're all here.
translation.it: Blu, verdi, gialli, rossi… ci sono tutti.

translation.en: [True] Bartleby, look! It's happening.
Happy Neverending Rainbow Day!
OK, what's next?
Let's try Rainbow Yeti Spaghetti.
How about the Rainbow Roller?
May I suggest a visit to Dillydally's Diorama of Dazzling Delight?
translation.it: Posso suggerire il Diorama di Gingilla alla Fiera lucente?

translation.en: -[True and Bartleby] Rainbow King! -[strums chord]
Happy Neverending Rainbow Day, your majesty.
And to you too, True and Bartleby.
So what's this dilly with the dazzly doodads...?
translation.it: E cosa sono questi… gingilli di luce?

translation.en: [chuckles] Dillydally's Diorama of Dazzling Delight!
translation.it: Diorama di Gingilla alla Fiera lucente.

translation.en: It's full of the most wonderful treasures from all across the Kingdom.
translation.it: È pieno dei tesori più belli da tutto il regno.

translation.en: Like this zookalele. My good friend Dillydally gave it to me.
translation.it: Come questo zukulele. Me l'ha dato la mia amica Gingilla.

translation.en: You know Dillydally, the Great Explorer?
Indeed I do.
She is one of my dearest friends. And we both love music,
translation.it: È una cara amica e amiamo la musica,

translation.en: so she always brings me back a musical souvenir from her travels.
translation.it: perciò mi porta sempre un ricordo musicale dai suoi viaggi.

translation.en: Can we meet her?
[laughs] Oh, goodness, no.
Dillydally went on an adventure to find a magical instrument
translation.it: Gingilla da un anno sta cercando uno strumento magico

translation.en: at the end of the Neverending Rainbow last year.
She's been gone a whole year? No wonder they call her Dillydally.
translation.it: Da un anno? Ecco perché la chiamano "Gingilla".

translation.en: Come to think of it, that is an awfully long time, even for Dillydally.
translation.it: Ora che ci penso, è tanto tempo, persino per Gingilla.

translation.en: I fear she may be... missing.
[both] Missing! We have to go find her.
Jumping juniper! It's far too dangerous, True.
translation.it: Giove balzante! È troppo pericoloso, Vera.

translation.en: Anyone who crosses the Neverending Rainbow must be prepared to face anything,
translation.it: Chi attraversa l'Arcobaleno Infinito dev'essere pronto a tutto

translation.en: and come back before sunset.
If anyone can find Dillydally and bring her back, it's me and Bartleby.
translation.it: Se c'è qualcuno che può riportarla qui, siamo io e Bartleby.

translation.en: Very well.
But remember... at sunset the Neverending Rainbow will vanish for another year.
translation.it: Molto bene. Ma ricorda, al tramonto, l'Arcobaleno Infinito svanirà per un altro anno.

translation.en: We'll move Kittynatti fast! Right, True?
translation.it: Saremo ultraveloci, non è così, Vera?

translation.en: First things first, we need some Wish help!
translation.it: Per prima cosa, ci serve aiuto.

translation.en: Oh, Cumulo!
Thanks, Cumulo.
We'll get you back to the carnival in time for the next ride.
translation.it: Ti faremo tornare presto al carnevale.

translation.en: [True] To the Wishing Tree, please.
OK, Wishes. From the top...
[gasps] Musical Wishes!
True, Bartleby! You like jazz?
translation.it: Vera! Bartleby! Vi piace il jazz?

translation.en: Listen to this!
We'd love to, Zee, but we're in a real hurry.
Yeah! We're going over the Neverending Rainbow. To find Dillydally.
translation.it: - Attraverseremo l'Arcobaleno Infinito. - Per trovare Gingilla.

translation.en: The Great Explorer? As I remember, she never came back from her last expedition.
translation.it: L'esploratrice! Non è più tornata dall'ultima spedizione.

translation.en: Right. So we're heading over the Rainbow to find her.
translation.it: Sì, e noi useremo l'arcobaleno per cercarla.

translation.en: That means you will have to come back by the end of the day. What if you get stuck on the other side too?
translation.it: Dovrete tornare prima del tramonto. E se poi rimanete bloccati anche voi?

translation.en: We do have to hurry, Zee, but we'll be just fine, as long as we have the right Wish help.
translation.it: Dovremo sbrigarci, Zee, ma coi desideri giusti ce la faremo.

translation.en: Absolutely!
Let's sit... and have a think.
OK True, how can the Wishing Tree help you?
translation.it: Ok, Vera. Come può aiutarti l'Albero dei Desideri?

translation.en: Well, maybe Dillydally didn't come back
translation.it: Beh, forse Gingilla non è tornata perché è intrappolata

translation.en: because she's trapped or needs some kind of help...
translation.it: Beh, forse Gingilla non è tornata perché è intrappolata o ha bisogno di aiuto. Dobbiamo essere pronti a tutto.

translation.en: We have to be prepared for anything.
translation.it: o ha bisogno di aiuto. Dobbiamo essere pronti a tutto.

translation.en: Right, we don't know what you might find over the Rainbow.
We might not know, but the Wishing Tree always shares the right Wishes.
translation.it: No, ma l'Albero dei Desideri condivide sempre i desideri giusti.

translation.en: Then it's up to me to figure out how to use them.
translation.it: E spetta a me capire come usarli.

translation.en: You always do, True.
The Wishing Tree has heard you, True.
translation.it: L'Albero dei Desideri ti ha sentito.

translation.en: It is time to get your three Wishes.
translation.it: Ora esprimi i tuoi tre Desideri.

translation.en: I'm ready!
Wishing Tree, Wishing Tree, please share your wonderful Wishes with me!
translation.it: Albero dei Desideri! Dona a me Desideri, un, due, tre.

translation.en: ♪ Wishing Tree ♪
♪ Share with me ♪
♪ Tiny Wishes, one, two, three ♪ Boo-ster!
♪ Wishing Tree, please share with me ♪
translation.it: Albero dei Desideri - Dai, dona a me - Scalpy!

translation.en: Whompit!
♪ Magic power for you and me ♪
translation.it: Le magie per te - E per me - Karakara!

translation.en: Korokoro!
♪ Magic power ♪
♪ In the Wishing Tree ♪
What an exciting ensemble of Wishes!
Now let's see what the Wishopedia says about their powers.
translation.it: Vediamo che dice Desideropedia sui loro poteri.

translation.en: This is Boo-ster.
This one will really blow you away.
[Zee] Boo-ster can take a big breath and blow out a super-powerful jet of air.
translation.it: Boo-ster può prendere un bel respiro e soffiare con forza.

translation.en: I can't wait to see you in action, Boo-ster.
Who do we have next?
Oh yes, this is Whompit.
Whompit!
[Zee] As you know, Whompit is a stomping Wish that just loves to stomp and smash the ground.
translation.it: Come sapete, Scalpy è un desiderio che ama calpestare il terreno.

translation.en: Nice to see you again, Whompit. I don't know when we'll need your help,
translation.it: Ciao, Scalpy. Non so quando ci servirai,

translation.en: but I'm sure we'll have a smashing good time!
translation.it: ma sono certa che ci divertiremo.

translation.en: Whompit!
And finally, we have Korokoro.
-Korokoro. -A super rare Wish.
[Zee] Korokoro has grippy powers. It can help you walk on really slippery surfaces.
translation.it: Karakara ha poteri di aderenza. Ti fa camminare su superfici scivolose.

translation.en: Amazing! I'm glad to have you with us, Korokoro.
translation.it: Grande! Bello averti con noi, Karakara.

translation.en: Korokoro!
Are you three ready for an adventure on the Neverending Rainbow?
translation.it: Siete pronti per andare sull'Arcobaleno Infinito?

translation.en: Zoo, zip, zap, Wishes in my pack!
translation.it: Ze, zip, zap, adesso entrate là!

translation.en: Thanks, Zee. We'll be back soon. I'm counting on it.
translation.it: - Grazie, Zee. Torneremo presto. - Ci conto.

translation.en: Thanks, Cumulo! You should get back to the Carnival. We can walk from here.
translation.it: Grazie, Nube. Torna al carnevale, noi proseguiamo a piedi.

translation.en: Yeah, it'll be nice to stretch our legs a bit...
translation.it: Sì, sarà bello sgranchirsi le gambe.

translation.en: Besides, how long could it take to cross the Neverending Rainbow?
translation.it: E quanto ci vorrà per attraversare l'Arcobaleno Infinito?

translation.en: [Bartleby] Skyblubbs? We must be really high up.
translation.it: Le ciccianuvole? Dobbiamo essere molto in alto.

translation.en: [pants] When are we going to get to the end of this neverending rainbow?
I can't believe Dillydally came all this way by herself.
translation.it: Come avrà fatto Gingilla ad arrivare qui da sola?

translation.en: I wonder what she was hoping to find.
I'm hoping to find the world's biggest zazoony juice.
translation.it: Io vorrei un enorme succo di Zazoony.

translation.en: Mmm... super frosty with lots of ice cubes and-- A fork!
translation.it: - Freddo, coi cubetti di ghiaccio e… - Un bivio!

translation.en: Um, I think a straw might work better for zazoony juice, True.
translation.it: Penso serva una cannuccia, con lo Zazoony.

translation.en: No, it's a fork in the rainbow. Look!
translation.it: No, c'è un bivio sull'arcobaleno. Guarda.

translation.en: -Huh? -Which way should we go?
I've got this, True. My tail always knows which way to go...
translation.it: Ci penso io, Vera. La mia coda sa sempre dove andare.

translation.en: That-a-way!
Why did your tail pick that path? Easy. That other path has stairs.
translation.it: - Perché proprio di là? - Facile. L'altro sentiero ha le scale.

translation.en: Good call, tail. Let's go.
Well, it's nothing but smooth sailing from here on out.
translation.it: Beh, fin qui il viaggio è stato tranquillo.

translation.en: Right, True?
Uh-oh. What do you mean, "uh-oh"?
Oh, dear.
It's like walking a tightrope.
We just need to walk slow and steady.
translation.it: Un passo alla volta, con calma.

translation.en: -I got you, True! -Phew! Thanks.
This is trickier than I thought... Ha! Not for a red-tabby Kittynatti.
translation.it: - Sarà dura. - Non per una cintura rossa Kittynati!

translation.en: Watch me, OK? And then just do what I do.
translation.it: Guardami, ok? E poi fai come me.

translation.en: See True? Easy peasy, rainbow squeezy!
translation.it: Vedi? Si fa in un batti-arcobaleno!

translation.en: Hang on, B!
-I gotcha! -Phew.
You OK, Bartleby?
I am now. But I don't think I could have held myself up much longer.
translation.it: Ora sì, ma non potevo resistere ancora a lungo.

translation.en: [Bartleby] Whoa! We're high!
This could work if we do it together.
translation.it: Proviamo a fare una cosa insieme.

translation.en: I'll hold you up, and you hold me up, OK?
translation.it: Io tengo su te e tu tieni su me, ok?

translation.en: OK, you got it.
Steady...
Easy...
-OK, come on. -OK.
You can do it, True! Just don't look down! 'Cause we're up so high, and you don't want to get dizzy.
translation.it: Puoi farcela, ma non guardare giù, perché l'altezza può darti le vertigini.

translation.en: You don't even want to think about falling 'cause it'll be like...
translation.it: E non pensare alla caduta, perché…

translation.en: [splat] Oh, I can't look!
-Done. -What?
We're here. We made it.
We did it! Go Teamwork, right?
translation.it: Sì! È stato un bel gioco di squadra, no?

translation.en: Thanks, B. Couldn't have done it without you.
translation.it: Grazie, non ce l'avrei fatta da sola. E guarda,

translation.en: And look, we're almost at the top of the Rainbow.
translation.it: Grazie, non ce l'avrei fatta da sola. E guarda, - siamo quasi in cima. - Già.

translation.en: Yeah, we can handle anything this wacky Rainbow can throw at us.
translation.it: L'arcobaleno non ci fa più paura.

translation.en: And I spoke too soon.
[gasps] Come on, we'd better be quick if we're going to beat that storm.
-[cloud grunts] -[True] Excuse me. Hi!
We really need to get to the other side of the rainbow. Could you please let us through?
translation.it: Dobbiamo andare dall'altra parte dell'arcobaleno. Puoi farci passare?

translation.en: Aw, you're stuck and you're too full of rain to move?
translation.it: Oh, hai troppa pioggia per muoverti?

translation.en: What do we do, True? We can't just stroll through a lightening cloud.
translation.it: Che si fa? Non possiamo passare tra i fulmini.

translation.en: One wrong move and...
Not if we use some Wish power to blow it away.
translation.it: Useremo un Desiderio per spazzarla via.

translation.en: Time for my first Wish!
Zip, zap, zoo, I choose you!
Wake up, Boo-ster, Wish come true!
translation.it: Svegliati, Boo-ster! Il desiderio si avvera!

translation.en: Hi, Boo-ster. See that big storm cloud over there?
translation.it: Ciao, Boo-ster. Vedi quella grande nuvola?

translation.en: It's stuck on the rainbow and it needs our help.
translation.it: È bloccata e le serve un aiuto.

translation.en: Let's give it a push with your super strong wind!
translation.it: Proviamo con il tuo vento fortissimo.

translation.en: OK, Boo-ster... Blow, blow... blow!
-Look, it's-- -Ticklish.
One more time, Boo-ster.
-You're welcome. -Thanks for not zapping us.
translation.it: - Prego. - Grazie per non averci fulminati.

translation.en: Great job, Boo-ster! Now back in the pack!
translation.it: Bravo, Boo-ster. Ora a letto nello zainetto.

translation.en: Whoa! Be careful, B. It's a little slippery...
translation.it: Attento, Bee. È un po' scivoloso…!

translation.en: Uh, True? I know this is fun and all... [yelling] but we don't have any brakes!
translation.it: Vera? So che è divertente, ma non abbiamo freni!

translation.en: Prepare for a crash landing!
We made it, B! This is the end of the Rainbow.
Dillydally must be somewhere on this island!
-Hello! -Dillydally! Are you here?
-[distant tapping] -[gasps]
Listen. Do you hear a "tink-tink-tink"?
translation.it: Ascolta! Senti anche tu questo picchiettìo?

translation.en: You must have cat ears, True.
I tink-tink-tink the tink-tink-tink is coming from over there!
translation.it: Penso che il picchiettìo venga da laggiù.

translation.en: -[louder tapping] -[gasps] Bartleby, look!
It's her... Dillydally!
Huh? What?
Oh my! Are you two lost?
No, we're here to find you!
I'm True, and this is Bartleby. We're friends of the Rainbow King.
translation.it: Siamo Vera e Bartleby, amici del Re Arcobaleno.

translation.en: Bouncing bongos!
Any friend of the Rainbow King is a friend of mine.
translation.it: Gli amici del Re Arcobaleno sono miei amici.

translation.en: ♪ Welcome to the rainbow's end ♪ ♪ I'm tickled pink to see you, friends ♪
translation.it: Benvenuti alla fine dell'arcobaleno Amici miei niente di meno

translation.en: ♪ Now listen up and lookie here ♪
♪ With big blue eyes and purple ears ♪
translation.it: Con occhi blu e orecchie alzate

translation.en: ♪ I pucker up and give a blow... ♪
Oh, dear.
♪ Oh dingle-dong There's something wrong ♪ ♪ I need that toot to toot along ♪
translation.it: C'è qualcosa che non va Nella melodia, mi sa

translation.en: ♪ Could use a stick un-stucker tool ♪ ♪ To help un-stuck that fuchsia jewel ♪
translation.it: Potrei usare un listello Per estrarre il gioiello

translation.en: ♪ I pucker up and give a blow... ♪
No!
♪ Oh dingle-dong There's something wrong ♪ ♪ I need that toot to toot along ♪
translation.it: C'è qualcosa che non va Nella melodia, mi sa

translation.en: ♪ I tink tink tink and tonk tonk tonk ♪ ♪ But no tink tonk will move that rock ♪
translation.it: Picchio qui e picchio là Ma la roccia ferma sta

translation.en: ♪ It's my Dillydally kazoofa-flute And all it needs now is a... ♪
translation.it: È il mio kazooflauto E ora devo solo…

translation.en: -Whoo-hoo! -Bravo! That was so fun.
Rainbow King would've loved that song.
Oh, Rainbow King... I miss him ever so dearly.
translation.it: Oh, il Re Arcobaleno. Mi manca proprio tanto.

translation.en: I haven't seen him for a whole year.
translation.it: Non lo vedo da un intero anno.

translation.en: I could never be away from True that long. But you're in luck!
translation.it: Io non resisterei tanto, ma sei fortunata!

translation.en: Because he sent us to find you and help get you home.
translation.it: Ci ha mandati lui per riportarti a casa.

translation.en: Don't be a silly slide whistle!
I'm not lost. I chose to stay here.
translation.it: Non mi sono persa. Ho scelto io di restare.

translation.en: I was collecting these magical crystals to make a kazoofa-flute as a souvenir for Rainbow King.
translation.it: Cercavo i cristalli magici per il kazooflauto da donare al Re Arcobaleno.

translation.en: But the very last crystal just won't budge so I'm missing a note.
translation.it: Ma l'ultimo cristallo è bloccato, perciò mi manca una nota.

translation.en: And I am not leaving without it.
translation.it: E non me ne andrò senza.

translation.en: What kind of a friend would I be if I brought home a half-finished souvenir?
translation.it: Che amica sarei, se regalassi un souvenir incompleto?

translation.en: I do not think she's coming with us any time soon. Nuh-uh.
translation.it: Non credo che la convinceremo a tornare.

translation.en: We came here to rescue Dillydally, and we're not going home without her.
translation.it: Siamo venuti apposta, non ce ne andremo senza Gingilla.

translation.en: Uh, well we'd better hurry, True. The sun's gonna set soon
and you, me and Dillydally will be stuck here until next Neverending Rainbow Day.
translation.it: di restare qui fino al prossimo Giorno dell'Arcobaleno Infinito.

translation.en: OK, if Dillydally won't leave without the last crystal,
translation.it: Ok, se Gingilla non vuole andarsene senza l'ultimo cristallo,

translation.en: maybe we can help get it out. Time for my second Wish!
translation.it: aiutiamola a estrarlo. È ora di esprimere il secondo Desiderio!

translation.en: Zip, zap, zoo, I choose you!
Wake up, Whompit!
-Whompit! -Wish come true!
Hi, Whompit!
We need your whompin', stompin' power to shake a crystal loose.
translation.it: Ci serve il tuo potere schiacciante per estrarre un cristallo.

translation.en: Whomp, whomp!
OK everybody, watch out!
-[loud thud] -[gasps] Clapping castanets! What was that?
Whompit's going to help you get that crystal out.
You might wanna stay off the ground for a little bit.
Hop on!
Alright, Whompit.
Let's stomp, stomp, stomp it!
Almost!
Way to stomp it, Whompit!
Now back in the pack! Whomp, whomp!
translation.it: - Ora a letto nello zainetto. - Scalp-scalp!

translation.en: Wow! It made the rainbow glow.
That's the power of the Rainbow Crystals!
translation.it: È il potere dei cristalli dell'arcobaleno.

translation.en: Isn't this is the perfect souvenir for Rainbow King?
translation.it: Non è il souvenir perfetto per Re Arcobaleno?

translation.en: He's going to love it, Dillydally.
And we're going to give it to him today, right?
As in before the sun goes down? [gasps] We might be too late!
translation.it: Cioè, prima che tramonti il sole. Forse è già tardi!

translation.en: [Dillydally] Without the sun, there will be no rainbow to take us home!
translation.it: Senza il sole, non ci sarà l'arcobaleno per tornare a casa.

translation.en: [gasps] Come on! Let's get moving.
It's way too steep.
Not for my super Kittynati rainbow grip!
translation.it: Non per la mia presa arcobaleno Kittynati!

translation.en: Remind me to sharpen my claws next time.
Is there another way off this island, Dillydally?
translation.it: C'è un altro modo per uscire dall'isola?

translation.en: I was going to figure that part out after I got the crystal.
translation.it: Ci avrei pensato dopo aver trovato il cristallo.

translation.en: So we're stuck here until next Neverending Rainbow Day?
translation.it: Resteremo qui fino al prossimo Giorno dell'Arcobaleno Infinito?

translation.en: Look on the bright side. We finished the kazoofa-flute!
translation.it: C'è un lato positivo. Il kazooflauto è completo.

translation.en: [Bartleby] What? I didn't even bring any Fishy Poof Crackers!
translation.it: Cosa? Non ho neanche i cracker pescettosi!

translation.en: Still so many Fishy Poof flavors to try!
translation.it: C'erano così tanti gusti ancora da provare…

translation.en: Come now, Bartleby. Get a grip on yourself.
That's it!
I have just the thing to help us get a grip.
translation.it: Ho quel che serve per la presa!

translation.en: It's time for my third Wish!
translation.it: È ora di esprimere il mio terzo desiderio.

translation.en: Zip, zap, zoo, I choose you!
Wake up, Korokoro!
Wish come true!
Hi, Korokoro!
We need your help to climb to the top of that super steep rainbow.
translation.it: Ci serve il tuo aiuto per salire in cima all'arcobaleno.

translation.en: Korokoro!
Go, Korokoro!
Come on, hop in.
Now, we all need to run as fast as we can.
translation.it: Ora corriamo il più veloce possibile.

translation.en: [True] It's working!
Um, why is the Rainbow flickering? The sun is setting.
translation.it: - Perché l'arcobaleno sfarfalla? - È il tramonto!

translation.en: We're running out of time!
Faster, everyone, faster!
Whoo-hoo! We made it to the top of the Rainbow! No more climbing!
translation.it: Siamo in cima all'arcobaleno! Basta scalare.

translation.en: It's all downhill from here!
[Dillydally] I can see Rainbow City.
[Bartleby yells] The rainbow is fading! We're not gonna make it!
translation.it: L'arcobaleno sta svanendo! Non ce la faremo!

translation.en: Dillydally! Your kazoofa-flute. Can you play it to keep the rainbow glowing?
translation.it: Gingilla, puoi suonare il tuo kazooflauto per far splendere l'arcobaleno?

translation.en: You betcha!
[Rainbow King] I should never have let them go over the Rainbow...
Oh, gruesome grey, I miss them so much.
translation.it: Oh, grigio tristone, mi mancano tanto.

translation.en: Wait! Could it be... ?
It's too late. The rainbow's gone.
[all] Oh no!
We're not going to make it, I don't think!
translation.it: Non credo che ce la faremo!

translation.en: Cumulo!
Terrific tambourines! You saved us.
Of all the cushy, fluffy things I love... you're the best!
translation.it: Di tutte le cose soffici che amo… sei la migliore.

translation.en: Thanks, Cumulo! I knew I could always count on you.
translation.it: Grazie, Nube. Sapevo di poter contare su di te.

translation.en: You too, Korokoro.
Korokoro!
-Now back in the pack. -Whoo-hoo!
Grateful green!
Dillydally!
Rainbow King!
I missed you so much.
I was so worried about you, old friend.
I'm sorry I was away so long.
But I just couldn't come home without a special treasure...
translation.it: ma non potevo tornare senza un tesoro speciale…

translation.en: for you.
Fantastic fuchsia!
A Kazoofa-flute!
But Dillydally, as wonderful as your souvenirs are,
translation.it: Ma per quanto adori i tuoi souvenir,

translation.en: there's no greater treasure than a true friend.
translation.it: non c'è tesoro più grande di una vera amica.

translation.en: Oh, Rainbow King, you're so right.
And I have two new friends who cared enough to come look for me.
translation.it: E ho due nuovi amici che mi sono venuti a cercare.

translation.en: I'm sorry you missed your Neverending Rainbow Day.
translation.it: Purtroppo avete perso il Giorno dell'Arcobaleno Infinito.

translation.en: Well, not the whole day. You didn't miss the grand finale.
translation.it: Beh, non tutto il giorno. Non avete perso il gran finale.

translation.en: Rocketing red and booming blue, a special sight for me and you!
translation.it: Rosso spaziale e crepitante blé, una vista speciale per voi e me.

translation.en: Here it comes! The best part of Neverending Rainbow Day.
translation.it: Ecco la parte migliore del Giorno dell'Arcobaleno Infinito.

translation.en: Fill the sky with wondrous light, find a friend and hug them tight!
translation.it: Riempi il cielo di una luce meravigliosa. Regala a un amico abbracci a iosa.

translation.en: [Dillydally] ♪ Welcome to the Rainbow's End ♪ ♪ I'm tickled pink to see you friend ♪
translation.it: Benvenuti alla fine dell'arcobaleno Amici miei niente di meno

translation.en: ♪ Now listen up and lookie here ♪ ♪ With big blue eyes and purple ears ♪
translation.it: Ascoltate e guardate Con occhi blu e orecchie alzate

translation.en: ♪ I pucker up and give a blow ♪
[Dillydally] Oh.
